column5: Thanks but no thanks....
Thank you so much!
I‚Äôm relatively new to having bp but they‚Äôre great pets!
Oh yeah, she‚Äôs very food motivated.
Oh my goodness. I haven‚Äôt been bitten yet, but it‚Äôll happen when I‚Äôm least expecting it.
Oh! Thank you!
We‚Äôve got another who is always missing his target, this last feeding he struck 4 times and missed. üòÇ we love our idiot snake too
I can‚Äôt wait until my babies get big! But definitely enjoying them being young and smol.
She‚Äôs still in denial about her marriage hoping my Dad will come to his ‚Äúsenses‚Äù but we‚Äôve maintained communication, she‚Äôs been part of my life since I was 2.

I‚Äôve kept the secret of my Dad cheating on my Stepmom for about 4 years. She ended up getting suspicious and was asking me very specific questions I ended up telling her everything that I knew my Dad was doing behind her back. It‚Äôs been about 4.5 months now and I feel like my family has fallen apart... I‚Äôm not allowed at my Dads anymore, my step mom moved out of the state, yet I don‚Äôt regret my choice. It was worse for me to keep that secret from somebody who loved me better than my own mother could at that time.
It gets better. Promise ‚ù§Ô∏è

Do you know what her plans after graduating are? If she stays in the same town, that‚Äôll be helpful for you. Also, I know it‚Äôs not the same as being 1-o-1 but even if she leaves the town I‚Äôm sure you could always call her when you‚Äôre having panic attacks. Good friends are hard to find, if they really love and care about you she‚Äôll make an effort to keep the relationship.
That‚Äôs my boyfriends plan was to get me into a NARNON and NA meeting. Thank you again, your words are so helpful and encouraging.

Thank you so much for your response! My boyfriend agrees with you, it just took me a long time to actually comprehend what it meant. Like you, I think it‚Äôs going to take a lot of talking to get through to him. I really appreciate your words! ‚ù§Ô∏è
Thank you for your words.
Ash!
I can‚Äôt wait to bring mine home!!!
Okay. Thank you!

I‚Äôm in quite a few chats, including the MNFH! There were a couple people who responded to me on the MNFH chat when I was in bit of a crisis last night. I definitely appreciate people like you who are willing to help someone in need ‚ù§Ô∏è

Me too dude, I‚Äôm usually the strong one and I haven‚Äôt stopped crying, I‚Äôve been going in and out of panic attacks like I don‚Äôt know anything it‚Äôs it‚Äôs keeping me so anxious. My BF is my only friend and I feel really lonely without him.

I sat in a courtroom while he was in his hearing in another for almost 3 hours. I spoke to his attorney to give my statement and she told me that she would call as soon as he was released and I heard nothing. His hearing was at 2 and I didn‚Äôt leave until 4:30. When I finally found the correct room I was told that he was released to family and I spent the last hour and a half working myself into a rage because I thought his mom was keeping him from me, when she didn‚Äôt have contact at all either.  Truthfully I have no idea how the case went...

Because i have a scratch on my nose they considered it a domestic Violence case and in the state of WA there‚Äôs automatically a no contact order put in place to protect the victim. Even if they don‚Äôt want it.
Now I have a no contact order and can‚Äôt talk to my other half for I don‚Äôt even know how many days. I‚Äôm losing my mind.
Thank you so much for all your kindness. I really appreciate you taking the time to help me out
That makes sense, I also brought up his mental health status and was told that based on that he will probably be seen in mental health court
I'm half temped to go sit in the jails parking lot until 10:30 because i'm so stressed and anxious

They said that they would hold him until his 1st appearance which is at 10:30A. I told the officer that I didn't want to press charges but because of the law with Domestic Violence they have to separate to give an extra cool down time. They said that when he sees his Judge there's a possibility that there could be a 10 day no communication order.
Both, They said that because the curtain rod hit me and scraped me that it's considered Domestic Violence. They gave me a little pamplet with phone numbers and his case number.
WA state
Happy Birthday! You are loved and valued in your life! Thank you for posting and allowing me to take the opportunity. Hope it's been a great day!

It's awesome that medications are helping! I suffer from depression and anxiety as well and it's not super fun that's for sure! I feel as though I'm getting back to being my normal self too! Happy Healing <3

Did you tell him that you didn't want or need to know? It's important to have your needs known especially with parents and the fact that they're laughing it appears to me that they want a rise out of you, because I'm not there and I don't know the whole story I could be wrong. If it turns out that that is the case, ignore them! family or not you get to choose who you're around and what makes you comfortable. I'm sorry to hear that being with family is uncomfortable.
I feel, what's eating you?
Literally nothing. BF doesn‚Äôt get off work until 11 and I have no other friends... yay!
Luna!
